content.description:
First off let me say that if I was awarding stars based strictly on movement this line would get at least 2 full stars, maybe a third. However, due to the friable rock it get bumped down to a single star. 

  Sit start on a flexing jug and pull up into the face above on crimps and gastons. Work your feet up to make a long move out left to a small intermediate crimp before bumping to a good but flexible crimp, climb lightly on this hold and hit the solid rock at the top out.
content.protection: Couple pads, maybe a spotter due to the sloped landing.
content.location: This is the highest line/furthest right line on the 'Cleaved Boulder' proper.

content.description: Interesting, long, slice of rock. Named for the sections that look like they were cleaved off the wall.
